items.label: Verify Patch cables under tabletop are connected to matching cables for away and home sides of the table

tasks.title: Switch Configuration || Ports 1-2 (Events VLAN) || Away Bench Connection

items.label: Patch POrt 1 -> Panel Port 1 above switch
Connect long black cable labeld 'Switch-Away' to patch port 1 (left end of table)
Run cable under bench seats
Place Netgear on floor under bench
Connect 3 blue Ethernet cables to Netgear
Verify connectivity: Away Bench IP - 172.32.x.x

tasks.title: Switch Configuration || Ports 1-2 (Event's VLAN) || Away Phone

items.label: Port 2 -> Patch to Panel Port 2 above switch
Connect visitor phone (check label under phone) using blue ethernet cable
Place phone at end of table near away bench
Attatch Referee replay monitor to the monitor mount on table
Port 3 -> Patch panel por 20 (find labeled ethernet cord

tasks.title: Switch Configuration || Ports 3-10 (NBA VLAN) || Tracey's Laptop

items.label: Port 4 --> Direct connect using labled cord
Connect laptop to UPS -> UPS to table outlet
Launch site: 10.111.24.29

tasks.title: Switch Configuration || Ports 11-20 (Event's VLAN) || Sound Meter

items.label: Port 11 -> Direct connect
Unpack mic & cover, route under table, place in front of switch
Connect with Labled ethernet cord
Plug in power cord to table outlet
Port 12 -> Direct Connect Statistician phone (look for labeled ethernet cord) and place to the left of the monitor
Port 13 -> Patch panel D020: Security phone (look for labeled ethernet cord) and place to the right of the monitor
Port 14 -> Patch panel D021: Tracey's phone (look for labeled ethernet cord)
Port 15 -> Patch panel D023: Tracey's phone light (look for labeled ethernet cord)

tasks.title: Switch Configuration || Ports 21-22 (BBOPS's VLAN) || Home Bench

items.label: Port 21 -> Patch panel D024
Connect long black ethernet cabled labeled 'Switch-Home' to patch port 24 on right side of table
run cable underneath bench seats, pushing down to avoid tripping hazard at seat gap
Place Netgear switch on floor under second row bench and run cable through cable trough
Connect 3 grey ethernet cables to Netgear
Verify connectivity: Home Bench IP - 172.32.x.x
Connect long orange labeled ethernet cord from 'dasher wall NBA port (D003)' -> under floor cover -> to port 24 on front table switch
Place Precisicion Time to right of the Tissot machine
Connect Precision Time via Ethernet to Port 5 on switch
Connect brown VGA cable from the back of Precision time to the back of the Tissot machine
Connect Precision Time USB cable to back of precision time, run underneath table and connect to dasher wall port labeled 'PTS'
Power off al devices
Disconnect and coil all cabeles
Return all items to labeled crates and cart in DVOM Closet
Confirm all cables and equipment are labeled and secured
